title: LOL: Qui crie, sort!
overview: They're back! For Ahmed Sylla, Audrey Fleurot, Fadily Camara, Hakim Jemili, Kyan Khojandi, Camille Lellouche, Bérengère Krief & Gérard Darmon, the danger is everywhere: in this edition, screaming can sometimes be as fatal as laughing! The last person who holds out against their opponents' attacks and the scare-themed, booby-trapped arena will get 150,000 euros donated to a charity of their choice.
